ProjectSubHeader: Why we all need to embrace mindful shopping
ProjectCopy: There are a lot of buzz-words, confusing terminology, endless certifications along with greenwashing, that make deciphering what is and isnâ€™t an ethical buy, a real minefield for consumers.
By condensing the key considerations to look for in each category the flip cards will empower consumers with the resources to make an informed decision.
